verses.verse: "Cry<WH7121> aloud,<WH1627> don't<WH2820> spare, lift<WH7311> up your voice<WH6963> like a trumpet,<WH7782> and declare<WH5046> to my people<WH5971> their disobedience,<WH6588> and to the house<WH1004> of Jacob<WH3290> their sins.<WH2403>

Yet they seek<WH1875> me daily,<WH3117> and delight<WH2654> to know<WH1847> my ways:<WH1870> as a nation<WH1471> that did<WH6213> righteousness,<WH6666> and didn't<WH5800> forsake the ordinance<WH4941> of their God,<WH430> they ask<WH7592> of me righteous<WH4941> judgments;<WH6664> they delight<WH2654> to draw near<WH7132> to God.<WH430>

<WH6684> 'Why have we fasted,' say they,<WH7200> 'and you don't see? Why have we afflicted<WH6031> our soul,<WH5315> and you take no knowledge?<WH3045>' "Behold,<WH3117> in the day of your fast<WH6685> you find<WH4672> pleasure,<WH2656> and exact<WH5065> all your labors.<WH6092>

Behold,<WH6684> you fast for strife<WH7379> and contention,<WH7379> and to strike<WH5221> with the fist<WH106> of wickedness:<WH7562> you don't<WH6684> fast this day<WH3117> so as to make your voice<WH6963> to be heard<WH8085> on high.<WH4791>

Is such the fast<WH6685> that I have chosen?<WH977> the day<WH3117> for a man<WH120> to afflict<WH6031> his soul?<WH5315> Is it to bow down<WH3721> his head<WH7218> as a rush,<WH100> and to spread<WH3331> sackcloth<WH8242> and ashes<WH665> under him?<WH7121> Will you call this<WH2088> a fast,<WH6685> and an acceptable<WH7522> day<WH3117> to Yahweh?<WH3068>

"Isn't<WH6685> this the fast that I have chosen:<WH977> to release<WH6605> the bonds<WH2784> of wickedness,<WH7562> to undo<WH5425> the bands<WH92> of the yoke,<WH4133> and to let the oppressed<WH7533> go<WH7971> free,<WH2670> and that you break<WH5423> every yoke?<WH4133>

Isn't<WH6536> it to distribute your bread<WH3899> to the hungry,<WH7457> and that you bring<WH935> the poor<WH6041> who are cast out<WH4788> to your house?<WH1004> When you see<WH7200> the naked,<WH6174> that you cover<WH3680> him;<WH5956> and that you not hide yourself from your own flesh?<WH1320>

Then your light<WH216> shall break forth<WH1234> as the morning,<WH7837> and your healing<WH724> shall spring forth<WH6779> speedily;<WH4120> and your righteousness<WH6664> shall go<WH1980> before<WH6440> you;<WH3519> the glory of Yahweh<WH3068> shall be your rear guard.<WH622>

Then you shall call,<WH7121> and Yahweh<WH3068> will answer;<WH6030> you shall cry,<WH7768> and he will say,<WH559> <WH5493> 'Here I am.' "If you take away from the midst<WH8432> of you the yoke,<WH4133> the putting forth<WH7971> of the finger,<WH676> and speaking<WH1696> wickedly;<WH205>

and if you draw out<WH6329> your soul<WH5315> to the hungry,<WH7457> and satisfy<WH7646> the afflicted<WH6031> soul:<WH5315> then your light<WH216> shall rise<WH2224> in darkness,<WH653> and your obscurity<WH2822> be as the noonday;<WH6672>

and Yahweh<WH3068> will guide<WH5148> you continually,<WH8548> and satisfy<WH7646> your soul<WH5315> in dry<WH6710> places,<WH2502> and make strong your bones;<WH6106> and you shall be like a watered<WH7302> garden,<WH1588> and like a spring<WH4161> of water,<WH4325> whose waters<WH4325> don't<WH3576> fail.

Those who shall be of you shall build<WH1129> the old<WH5769> waste places;<WH2723> you shall raise up<WH6965> the foundations<WH4146> of many<WH1755> generations;<WH1755> and you shall be called<WH7121> The repairer<WH1443> of the breach,<WH6556> The restorer<WH7725> of paths<WH5410> to dwell in.<WH3427>

"If you turn away<WH7725> your foot<WH7272> from the Sabbath,<WH7676> from doing<WH6213> your pleasure<WH2656> on my holy<WH6944> day;<WH3117> and call<WH7121> the Sabbath<WH7676> a delight,<WH6027> and the holy<WH6918> of Yahweh<WH3068> honorable;<WH3513> and shall honor<WH3513> it,<WH6213> not doing your own ways,<WH1870> nor finding<WH4672> your own pleasure,<WH2656> nor speaking<WH1696> your own words:<WH1697>

then you shall delight<WH6026> yourself in Yahweh;<WH3068> and I will make you to ride<WH7392> on the high places<WH1116> of the earth;<WH776> and I will feed<WH398> you with the heritage<WH5159> of Jacob<WH3290> your father:<WH1>" for the mouth<WH6310> of Yahweh<WH3068> has spoken it.<WH1696>
